attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"This enhancement is still unresolved and separate from #814 (closed), because sorting can still overwrite custom manual order without a direct restore or undo path.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionTreeWindow.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionContextMenu.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionTree/ConnectionTree.cs","mRemoteNGTests/UI/Window/ConnectionTreeWindowTests.cs"],"approach":"Add a reversible sort toggle that snapshots and restores custom child order, plus a confirmation or disable guard before destructive sort actions."}

result.reason: Users currently lose manual connection ordering when sorting; an undo or toggle is needed to restore the previous state.
result.approach: Implement an 'Undo Sort' feature by caching the child node order of a folder before applying a sort operation, allowing restoration of the manual order.
